markdownRemark.html: On the PBooks demo we have started testing the Account Groups page using the Selenium Core. I first wrote the tests using the IDE then I moved the tests onto the server and into the test suite. While using the IDE I did not seem to run into any problems adding and editing groups on the page. However When I ran the tests with the core I ran into a few different bugs. I am not sure what the problem is seeing as how the IDE ran the tests without a problem.
